# The `UtilitySignature` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The signature of a particular utility node used for the bisection step, i.e., the number of <code>FunctionNodes</code> in each of the two buckets. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct llvm::BalancedPartitioning::UtilitySignature</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

The signature of a particular utility node used for the bisection step, i.e., the number of <code>FunctionNodes</code> in each of the two buckets.
